name: I Shoot You.exe
description:
Welcome to I Shoot You.exe: the best game since Celeste. In this beautiful game, you role-play as yourself, and I role-play as Guy. My goal is to shoot you, and your goal is to let it happen. This project was two years in the making, but after hours of play-testing, thousands of dollars of debt, and lost relationships, it's finally here for everyone to "enjoy."

BONUS: There's a secret note. Can you find it?

        Hint: You will have to download version 2 (v2.0).

Controls:

Mouse buttons or any key (other than the escape key): Progresses the game.

Escape key: Exits the game.

Credits:

Me (Al Symtaro) - Game designer and programmer.

Thank you, Triple Quotes on YouTube for the muzzle flash.

Thank you, pathdoc at Adobe Stock Images for "Guy."

Thank you, turk_stock_photographer at iStock for the finger gun.

Thank you, 2happy at Stockvault for the fire on the cover image.

Thank you, publicdomainvectors.org for the gun vector.

Thank you, Unity for allowing me to make this ridiculous game.

If you have any personal questions or claims regarding the game, please email me at alsymtaro@gmail.com. Otherwise, please use the comment section for your feedback and ideas.
